trans-unit.source: Access checking
trans-unit.target: 访问检查

trans-unit.source: Access checks are applied in the factory methods of Lookup, when a method handle is created. This is a key difference from the Core Reflection API, since java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke performs access checking against every caller, on every call.
trans-unit.target: 创建方法句柄时，访问检查将应用于 Lookup 的工厂方法中。这是与Core Reflection API的主要区别，因为 java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke 对每个调用者在每个调用上执行访问检查。

trans-unit.source: Access indicates a new connection being established using session data. Application level operations, such as getting or setting a value associated with the session, are not reflected in this access time.
trans-unit.target: 访问表示使用会话数据建立的新连接。应用程序级别的操作,如获取或设置与会话相关的值,不反映在这个访问时间中。

trans-unit.source: According to a limitation, a relation MBean must be registered in the same MBean Server as the Relation Service expected to handle it. So the user relation MBean has to be created and registered, and then the wrapped RelationSupport object can be created within the identified MBean Server.
trans-unit.target: 根据一个限制条件,关系MBean必须与期望处理它的关系服务在同一个MBean服务器中注册。因此,用户关系MBean必须被创建和注册,然后包装的RelationSupport对象可以在确定的MBean服务器中被创建。

trans-unit.target: 根据这些规则,例如,以下URI是允许的。

trans-unit.source: Accordingly, behavioral parameters in stream pipelines whose source might not be concurrent should never modify the stream's data source. A behavioral parameter is said to interfere with a non-concurrent data source if it modifies, or causes to be modified, the stream's data source. The need for non-interference applies to all pipelines, not just parallel ones. Unless the stream source is concurrent, modifying a stream's data source during execution of a stream pipeline can cause exceptions, incorrect answers, or nonconformant behavior. For well-behaved stream sources, the source can be modified before the terminal operation commences and those modifications will be reflected in the covered elements. For example, consider the following code:
trans-unit.target: 因此，源可能不是并发的流管道中的行为参数永远不应修改流的数据源。如果行为参数修改或导致修改流的数据源，则该行为参数会干扰非并发数据源。无干扰的需求适用于所有管道，而不仅仅是并行管道。除非流源是并发的，否则在流管道执行期间修改流的数据源可能会导致异常，错误的答案或不一致的行为。对于行为良好的流源，可以在终端操作开始之前修改源，并且这些修改将反映在所涵盖的元素中。例如，考虑以下代码：

trans-unit.source: Acoustic Lab

trans-unit.source: Acquires a lock on the given region of this channel's file.
trans-unit.target: 获取该通道文件中指定区域的锁。

trans-unit.source: Acquires a permit from this semaphore, blocking until one is available, or the thread is interrupted.
trans-unit.target: 从此信号量获取许可，阻塞直到可用，否则线程被中断。

trans-unit.source: Acquires a permit from this semaphore, blocking until one is available.
trans-unit.target: 从这个信号机上获取一个许可,在有许可之前先阻断。

trans-unit.source: Acquires a permit from this semaphore, if one becomes available within the given waiting time and the current thread has not been interrupted.
trans-unit.target: 如果在给定的等待时间内可用，并且当前线程尚未中断，则从此信号量获取许可。

trans-unit.source: Acquires a permit from this semaphore, only if one is available at the time of invocation.
trans-unit.target: 只有在调用时有空闲的情况下,才能从该信号体获得许可。

trans-unit.source: Acquires a permit, if one is available and returns immediately, reducing the number of available permits by one.
trans-unit.target: 在有许可证的情况下,获得一个许可证,并立即返回,将可用许可证的数量减少一个;

trans-unit.source: Acquires a permit, if one is available and returns immediately, with the value true, reducing the number of available permits by one.
trans-unit.target: 如果许可证可用，则获取许可证，然后立即返回，值为 true ，将可用许可证的数量减少一个。

trans-unit.source: Acquires an exclusive lock on this channel's file.
trans-unit.target: 获得该通道文件的专属锁定。

trans-unit.source: Acquires and returns all permits that are immediately available.
trans-unit.target: 获取并归还所有可立即使用的许可证。

trans-unit.source: Acquires in exclusive mode, aborting if interrupted. Implemented by first checking interrupt status, then invoking at least once tryAcquire(long), returning on success. Otherwise the thread is queued, possibly repeatedly blocking and unblocking, invoking tryAcquire(long) until success or the thread is interrupted. This method can be used to implement method Lock.lockInterruptibly().
trans-unit.target: 以独占模式获取，如果中断则中止。通过首先检查中断状态，然后至少调用一次 tryAcquire(long) 来实现，并成功返回。否则，将线程排队，并可能反复阻塞和解除阻塞，并调用 tryAcquire(long) 直到成功或线程被中断。此方法可用于实现方法 Lock.lockInterruptibly() 。

trans-unit.source: Acquires in exclusive mode, aborting if interrupted. Implemented by first checking interrupt status, then invoking at least once tryAcquire(int), returning on success. Otherwise the thread is queued, possibly repeatedly blocking and unblocking, invoking tryAcquire(int) until success or the thread is interrupted. This method can be used to implement method Lock.lockInterruptibly().
trans-unit.target: 以互斥方式获取，如果被中断则中止。通过首先检查中断状态，然后至少调用一次 tryAcquire(int) 来实现，并成功返回。否则，将线程排队，并可能反复阻塞和解除阻塞，并调用 tryAcquire(int) 直到成功或线程被中断为止。此方法可用于实现方法 Lock.lockInterruptibly() 。

trans-unit.source: Acquires in exclusive mode, ignoring interrupts. Implemented by invoking at least once tryAcquire(long), returning on success. Otherwise the thread is queued, possibly repeatedly blocking and unblocking, invoking tryAcquire(long) until success. This method can be used to implement method Lock.lock().
trans-unit.target: 在独占模式下获取，忽略中断。通过至少调用一次 tryAcquire(long) 来实现，并在成功后返回。否则，将线程排队，并可能反复阻塞和解除阻塞，并调用 tryAcquire(long) 直到成功。此方法可用于实现方法 Lock.lock() 。

trans-unit.source: Acquires in exclusive mode, ignoring interrupts. Implemented by invoking at least once tryAcquire(int), returning on success. Otherwise the thread is queued, possibly repeatedly blocking and unblocking, invoking tryAcquire(int) until success. This method can be used to implement method Lock.lock().
trans-unit.target: 在独占模式下获取，忽略中断。通过至少调用一次 tryAcquire(int) 来实现，并在成功后返回。否则，线程将排队，并可能反复阻塞和解除阻塞，并调用 tryAcquire(int) 直到成功。此方法可用于实现方法 Lock.lock() 。

trans-unit.source: Acquires in shared mode, aborting if interrupted. Implemented by first checking interrupt status, then invoking at least once tryAcquireShared(long), returning on success. Otherwise the thread is queued, possibly repeatedly blocking and unblocking, invoking tryAcquireShared(long) until success or the thread is interrupted.
trans-unit.target: 以共享模式获取，如果中断则中止。通过首先检查中断状态，然后至少调用一次 tryAcquireShared(long) 来实现，并成功返回。否则，线程将排队，并可能反复阻塞和解除阻塞，并调用 tryAcquireShared(long) 直到成功或线程被中断。

trans-unit.source: Acquires in shared mode, aborting if interrupted. Implemented by first checking interrupt status, then invoking at least once tryAcquireShared(int), returning on success. Otherwise the thread is queued, possibly repeatedly blocking and unblocking, invoking tryAcquireShared(int) until success or the thread is interrupted.
trans-unit.target: 以共享模式获取，如果中断则中止。通过首先检查中断状态，然后至少调用一次 tryAcquireShared(int) 来实现，并成功返回。否则，线程将排队，并可能反复阻塞和解除阻塞，并调用 tryAcquireShared(int) 直到成功或线程被中断。

trans-unit.source: Acquires in shared mode, ignoring interrupts. Implemented by first invoking at least once tryAcquireShared(long), returning on success. Otherwise the thread is queued, possibly repeatedly blocking and unblocking, invoking tryAcquireShared(long) until success.
trans-unit.target: 以共享模式获取，忽略中断。通过首先至少调用一次 tryAcquireShared(long) 来实现，并在成功后返回。否则，线程将排队，并可能反复阻塞和解除阻塞，并调用 tryAcquireShared(long) 直到成功。

trans-unit.source: Acquires in shared mode, ignoring interrupts. Implemented by first invoking at least once tryAcquireShared(int), returning on success. Otherwise the thread is queued, possibly repeatedly blocking and unblocking, invoking tryAcquireShared(int) until success.
trans-unit.target: 以共享模式获取，忽略中断。通过首先至少调用一次 tryAcquireShared(int) 来实现，并在成功后返回。否则，将线程排队，并可能反复阻塞和解除阻塞，并调用 tryAcquireShared(int) 直到成功。

trans-unit.source: Acquires the given number of permits from this semaphore, blocking until all are available, or the thread is interrupted.
trans-unit.target: 从此信号量获取给定数量的许可，阻塞直到所有可用，否则线程被中断。

trans-unit.source: Acquires the given number of permits from this semaphore, blocking until all are available.
trans-unit.target: 从该旗语中获取给定数量的许可,并阻断所有许可,直到所有许可可用。

trans-unit.source: Acquires the given number of permits from this semaphore, if all become available within the given waiting time and the current thread has not been interrupted.
trans-unit.target: 如果所有信号都在给定的等待时间内可用，并且当前线程未中断，则从此信号量获取给定数量的许可。

trans-unit.source: Acquires the given number of permits from this semaphore, only if all are available at the time of invocation.
trans-unit.target: 从本旗语中获取指定数量的许可,但前提是在调用时所有许可都可用。

trans-unit.source: Acquires the given number of permits, if they are available and returns immediately, with the value true, reducing the number of available permits by the given amount.
trans-unit.target: 如果有可用许可证，则获取给定数量的许可证，然后立即返回 true 值，将可用许可证的数量减少给定数量。

trans-unit.source: Acquires the given number of permits, if they are available, and returns immediately, reducing the number of available permits by the given amount.
trans-unit.target: 如果有给定数量的许可证,则获得给定数量的许可证,并立即返回,减少给定数量的可用许可证。

trans-unit.source: Acquires the given number of permits, if they are available, and returns immediately, with the value true, reducing the number of available permits by the given amount.
trans-unit.target: 获取给定数量的许可证（如果有），并立即返回 true 值，将可用数量减少给定数量。

trans-unit.source: Acquires the lock if it is available and returns immediately with the value true. If the lock is not available then this method will return immediately with the value false.
trans-unit.target: 获取锁（如果有）并立即返回 true 值。如果锁不可用，则此方法将立即返回 false 值。

trans-unit.source: Acquires the lock if it is available and returns immediately.
trans-unit.target: 如果有锁,则获取锁,并立即返回。

trans-unit.source: Acquires the lock if it is free within the given waiting time and the current thread has not been interrupted.
trans-unit.target: 如果锁在给定的等待时间内是空闲的，并且当前线程尚未中断，则获取该锁。

trans-unit.source: Acquires the lock if it is not held by another thread and returns immediately with the value true, setting the lock hold count to one. Even when this lock has been set to use a fair ordering policy, a call to tryLock()will immediately acquire the lock if it is available, whether or not other threads are currently waiting for the lock. This "barging" behavior can be useful in certain circumstances, even though it breaks fairness. If you want to honor the fairness setting for this lock, then use tryLock(0, TimeUnit.SECONDS) which is almost equivalent (it also detects interruption).
trans-unit.target: 如果没有其他线程持有该锁，则获取该锁，并立即返回 true ，将锁的保持计数设置为一个。即使已将此锁设置为使用公平的排序策略，对 tryLock() 的调用也会立即获取该锁（如果可用），无论其他线程当前是否在等待该锁。即使破坏公平性，这种“讨价还价”的行为在某些情况下还是有用的。如果要遵守此锁的公平性设置，请使用几乎等效的 tryLock(0, TimeUnit.SECONDS) （它还会检测到中断）。

trans-unit.source: Acquires the lock if it is not held by another thread and returns immediately with the value true, setting the lock hold count to one. If this lock has been set to use a fair ordering policy then an available lock will not be acquired if any other threads are waiting for the lock. This is in contrast to the tryLock() method. If you want a timed tryLock that does permit barging on a fair lock then combine the timed and un-timed forms together:
trans-unit.target: 如果没有其他线程持有该锁，则获取该锁，并立即返回 true ，将锁的保持计数设置为一个。如果已将此锁设置为使用公平的排序策略，则如果任何其他线程正在等待该锁，则不会获取可用锁。这与 tryLock() 方法相反。如果您想要定时的 tryLock 确实允许对公平锁进行插入，则将定时和非定时形式组合在一起：

trans-unit.source: Acquires the lock if it is not held by another thread and returns immediately, setting the lock hold count to one.
trans-unit.target: 如果锁没有被其他线程持有,则获得锁,并立即返回,将锁的持有数设为1。

trans-unit.source: Acquires the lock if it is not held by another thread within the given waiting time and the current thread has not been interrupted.
trans-unit.target: 如果在给定的等待时间内另一个线程未持有该锁并且当前线程尚未中断，则获取该锁。

trans-unit.source: Acquires the lock only if it is free at the time of invocation.
trans-unit.target: 只有在调用时是空闲的情况下才会获得锁。

trans-unit.source: Acquires the lock only if it is not held by another thread at the time of invocation.
trans-unit.target: 只有在调用时没有被其他线程持有的情况下才会获得锁。

trans-unit.source: Acquires the lock unless the current thread is interrupted.
trans-unit.target: 除非当前线程被中断，否则获取锁。

trans-unit.source: Acquires the lock.
trans-unit.target: 获得锁。

trans-unit.source: Acquires the read lock if the write lock is not held by another thread and returns immediately with the value true. Even when this lock has been set to use a fair ordering policy, a call to tryLock()will immediately acquire the read lock if it is available, whether or not other threads are currently waiting for the read lock. This "barging" behavior can be useful in certain circumstances, even though it breaks fairness. If you want to honor the fairness setting for this lock, then use tryLock(0, TimeUnit.SECONDS) which is almost equivalent (it also detects interruption).
trans-unit.target: 如果写锁未被另一个线程持有，则获取读锁，并立即返回 true 值。即使已将此锁设置为使用公平的排序策略，对 tryLock() 的调用也会立即获取读取锁（如果可用），无论其他线程当前是否在等待读取锁。即使破坏公平性，这种“讨价还价”的行为在某些情况下还是有用的。如果要遵守此锁的公平性设置，请使用几乎等效的 tryLock(0, TimeUnit.SECONDS) （它还会检测到中断）。

trans-unit.source: Acquires the read lock if the write lock is not held by another thread and returns immediately with the value true. If this lock has been set to use a fair ordering policy then an available lock will not be acquired if any other threads are waiting for the lock. This is in contrast to the tryLock() method. If you want a timed tryLock that does permit barging on a fair lock then combine the timed and un-timed forms together:
trans-unit.target: 如果写锁未被另一个线程持有，则获取读锁，并立即返回 true 值。如果已将此锁设置为使用公平的排序策略，则如果任何其他线程正在等待该锁，则不会获取可用锁。这与 tryLock() 方法相反。如果您想要定时的 tryLock 确实允许对公平锁进行插入，则将定时和非定时形式组合在一起：

trans-unit.source: Acquires the read lock if the write lock is not held by another thread and returns immediately.
trans-unit.target: 如果写锁没有被其他线程持有,则获得读锁,并立即返回。

trans-unit.source: Acquires the read lock if the write lock is not held by another thread within the given waiting time and the current thread has not been interrupted.
trans-unit.target: 如果在给定的等待时间内另一个线程未持有写锁定，并且当前线程尚未中断，则获取读锁定。

trans-unit.source: Acquires the read lock only if the write lock is not held by another thread at the time of invocation.
trans-unit.target: 只有在调用时写锁没有被另一个线程持有时,才会获得读锁。

trans-unit.source: Acquires the read lock unless the current thread is interrupted.
trans-unit.target: 除非当前线程被中断，否则获取读锁定。

trans-unit.source: Acquires the read lock.
trans-unit.target: 获得读取锁。

trans-unit.source: Acquires the write lock if it is not held by another thread within the given waiting time and the current thread has not been interrupted.
trans-unit.target: 如果在给定的等待时间内另一个线程未持有该写锁，并且当前线程尚未中断，则获取该写锁。

trans-unit.source: Acquires the write lock if neither the read nor write lock are held by another thread and returns immediately with the value true, setting the write lock hold count to one. Even when this lock has been set to use a fair ordering policy, a call to tryLock()will immediately acquire the lock if it is available, whether or not other threads are currently waiting for the write lock. This "barging" behavior can be useful in certain circumstances, even though it breaks fairness. If you want to honor the fairness setting for this lock, then use tryLock(0, TimeUnit.SECONDS) which is almost equivalent (it also detects interruption).
trans-unit.target: 如果读取和写入锁均未由另一个线程持有，则获取写入锁，并立即返回 true 值，将写入锁的保持计数设置为1。即使已将此锁设置为使用公平的排序策略，对 tryLock() 的调用也将立即获取该锁（如果可用），无论其他线程当前是否在等待写锁。即使破坏公平性，这种“讨价还价”的行为在某些情况下还是有用的。如果要遵守此锁的公平性设置，请使用几乎等效的 tryLock(0, TimeUnit.SECONDS) （它还会检测到中断）。

trans-unit.source: Acquires the write lock if neither the read nor write lock are held by another thread and returns immediately with the value true, setting the write lock hold count to one. If this lock has been set to use a fair ordering policy then an available lock will not be acquired if any other threads are waiting for the write lock. This is in contrast to the tryLock() method. If you want a timed tryLock that does permit barging on a fair lock then combine the timed and un-timed forms together:
trans-unit.target: 如果读取和写入锁均未由另一个线程持有，则获取写入锁，并立即返回 true 值，将写入锁的保持计数设置为1。如果已将此锁定设置为使用公平的排序策略，则如果任何其他线程正在等待写锁定，则不会获取可用的锁定。这与 tryLock() 方法相反。如果您想要定时的 tryLock 确实允许对公平锁进行插入，则将定时和非定时形式组合在一起：

trans-unit.source: Acquires the write lock if neither the read nor write lock are held by another thread and returns immediately, setting the write lock hold count to one.
trans-unit.target: 如果读锁和写锁都没有被其他线程持有,则获得写锁,并立即返回,将写锁持有数设为1。

trans-unit.source: Acquires the write lock only if it is not held by another thread at the time of invocation.
trans-unit.target: 只有在调用时没有被其他线程持有的情况下,才会获得写锁。

trans-unit.source: Acquires the write lock unless the current thread is interrupted.
trans-unit.target: 除非当前线程被中断，否则获取写锁定。

trans-unit.source: Acquires the write lock.
trans-unit.target: 获得写入锁。

trans-unit.source: Action indicating that a coding error is to be handled by dropping the erroneous input and resuming the coding operation.
trans-unit.target: 表示要处理编码错误的动作,放弃错误的输入,恢复编码操作。

trans-unit.source: Action indicating that a coding error is to be handled by dropping the erroneous input, appending the coder's replacement value to the output buffer, and resuming the coding operation.
trans-unit.target: 表示要处理编码错误的动作,放弃错误的输入,将编码器的替换值追加到输出缓冲区,并恢复编码操作。

trans-unit.source: Action indicating that a coding error is to be reported, either by returning a CoderResult object or by throwing a CharacterCodingException, whichever is appropriate for the method implementing the coding process.
trans-unit.target: 通过返回 CoderResult 对象或引发 CharacterCodingException 来指示要报告编码错误的操作，以适合于实现编码过程的方法为准。

trans-unit.source: Actions in a thread prior to placing an object into any concurrent collection
trans-unit.target: 在将一个对象放入任何并发集合之前,线程中的动作。

trans-unit.source: Actions in a thread prior to the submission of a Runnable to an Executor
trans-unit.target: 操作在一个线程之前提交的 Runnable 的一个 Executor

trans-unit.source: Actions prior to "releasing" synchronizer methods such as Lock.unlock, Semaphore.release, and CountDownLatch.countDown
trans-unit.target: “释放”同步器方法（例如 Lock.unlock ， Semaphore.release 和 CountDownLatch.countDown )之前的操作

trans-unit.source: Actions prior to calling CyclicBarrier.await and Phaser.awaitAdvance (as well as its variants)
trans-unit.target: 调用 CyclicBarrier.await 和 Phaser.awaitAdvance （及其变体）之前的操作

trans-unit.source: Actions supplied for dependent completions of non-async methods may be performed by the thread that completes the current CompletableFuture, or by any other caller of a completion method.
trans-unit.target: 为非异步方法的相关完成提供的动作可以由完成当前CompletableFuture的线程执行，也可以由完成方法的任何其他调用者执行。

trans-unit.source: Actions taken by the asynchronous computation represented by a Future
trans-unit.target: 由 Future 表示的异步计算采取的操作

trans-unit.source: Activate, and/or mark Applet active. Implementors of this interface shall mark this Applet as active, and optionally invoke its start() method.
trans-unit.target: 激活,和/或标记Applet为活动状态。该接口的实现者应将该Applet标记为活动状态,并可选择调用其start()方法。

trans-unit.source: Activates the connector server, that is starts listening for client connections. Calling this method when the connector server is already active has no effect. Calling this method when the connector server has been stopped will generate an IOException.
trans-unit.target: 激活连接器服务器，该服务器开始侦听客户端连接。连接器服务器已经处于活动状态时，调用此方法无效。连接器服务器停止后调用此方法将生成 IOException 。

trans-unit.source: Activates the connector server, that is, starts listening for client connections. Calling this method when the connector server is already active has no effect. Calling this method when the connector server has been stopped will generate an IOException.
trans-unit.target: 激活连接器服务器，即开始侦听客户端连接。连接器服务器已经处于活动状态时，调用此方法无效。连接器服务器停止后调用此方法将生成 IOException 。

trans-unit.source: Activates the controller. If true is returned, all settings in the IIOMetadata object should be ready for use in a write operation. If false is returned, no settings in the IIOMetadata object will be disturbed (
trans-unit.target: 激活控制器。如果返回 true ，则 IIOMetadata 对象中的所有设置都应准备好用于写操作。如果返回 false ， IIOMetadata 不会干扰IIOMetadata对象中的设置（

trans-unit.source: Activates the controller. If true is returned, all settings in the IIOParam object should be ready for use in a read or write operation. If false is returned, no settings in the IIOParam object will be disturbed (
trans-unit.target: 激活控制器。如果返回 true ，则应准备好 IIOParam 对象中的所有设置以用于读取或写入操作。如果返回 false ，则不会干扰 IIOParam 对象中的设置（

trans-unit.source: Activates the installed IIOMetadataController for this IIOMetadata object and returns the resulting value. When this method returns true, all values for this IIOMetadata object will be ready for the next write operation. If false is returned, no settings in this object will have been disturbed (
trans-unit.target: 激活为此 IIOMetadata 对象安装的 IIOMetadataController 并返回结果值。当此方法返回 true 时，此 IIOMetadata 对象的所有值将准备好进行下一次写操作。如果返回 false ,则该对象中的任何设置都不会受到干扰（

trans-unit.source: Activates the installed IIOParamController for this IIOParam object and returns the resulting value. When this method returns true, all values for this IIOParam object will be ready for the next read or write operation. If false is returned, no settings in this object will have been disturbed (
trans-unit.target: 激活为此 IIOParam 对象安装的 IIOParamController 并返回结果值。当此方法返回 true 时，此 IIOParam 对象的所有值将准备好进行下一个读取或写入操作。如果返回 false ,则该对象中的任何设置都不会受到干扰（

trans-unit.source: Adapts a Collector accepting elements of type U to one accepting elements of type T by applying a mapping function to each input element before accumulation.
trans-unit.target: 通过在累加之前对每个输入元素应用映射函数，将类型为 U 的 Collector 接受元素调整为类型为 T 的一个接受元素。

trans-unit.source: Adapts a Collector to perform an additional finishing transformation. For example, one could adapt the toList() collector to always produce an immutable list with:
trans-unit.target: 使 Collector 执行附加的整理转换。例如，可以修改 toList() 收集器以始终产生具有以下内容的不可变列表：

trans-unit.source: Adapts a target method handle by post-processing its return value (if any) with a filter (another method handle). The result of the filter is returned from the adapter.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用过滤器(另一个方法句柄)对目标方法句柄的返回值(如果有的话)进行后处理来适应它。过滤器的结果由适配器返回。

trans-unit.source: Adapts a target method handle by pre-processing a sub-sequence of its arguments with a filter (another method handle). The pre-processed arguments are replaced by the result (if any) of the filter function. The target is then called on the modified (usually shortened) argument list.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用过滤器(另一个方法句柄)对目标方法句柄的参数子序列进行预处理来调整目标方法句柄。预处理后的参数被过滤器函数的结果(如果有的话)替换。然后根据修改后的(通常是缩短的)参数列表调用目标方法。

trans-unit.source: Adapts a target method handle by pre-processing one or more of its arguments, each with its own unary filter function, and then calling the target with each pre-processed argument replaced by the result of its corresponding filter function.
trans-unit.target: 通过对目标方法的一个或多个参数进行预处理来调整目标方法句柄,每个参数都有自己的一元过滤函数,然后调用目标方法,每个预处理后的参数都被其对应的过滤函数的结果所替代。

trans-unit.source: Adapts a target method handle by pre-processing some of its arguments, and then calling the target with the result of the pre-processing, inserted into the original sequence of arguments.
trans-unit.target: 通过对目标方法的一些参数进行预处理来调整目标方法句柄,然后用预处理的结果调用目标方法,并插入到原始参数序列中。

trans-unit.source: Add
trans-unit.target: Add

trans-unit.source: Add a PropertyChangeListener for a specific property. The listener will be invoked only when a call on firePropertyChange names that specific property. The same listener object may be added more than once. For each property, the listener will be invoked the number of times it was added for that property. If propertyName or listener is null, no exception is thrown and no action is taken.
trans-unit.target: 为特定属性添加PropertyChangeListener。仅当对firePropertyChange的调用命名该特定属性时，才会调用该侦听器。同一侦听器对象可能会添加多次。对于每个属性，将调用侦听器为该属性添加的次数。如果 propertyName 或 listener 为null，则不会引发任何异常并且不执行任何操作。

trans-unit.source: Add a PropertyChangeListener for a specific property. The same listener object may be added more than once. For each property, the listener will be invoked the number of times it was added for that property. If name or pcl is null, no exception is thrown and no action is taken.
trans-unit.target: 为特定属性添加PropertyChangeListener。同一侦听器对象可能会添加多次。对于每个属性，将调用侦听器为该属性添加的次数。如果 name 或 pcl 为null，则不会引发异常，也不会采取任何措施。

trans-unit.source: Add a PropertyChangeListener to the listener list. The listener is registered for all properties. The same listener object may be added more than once, and will be called as many times as it is added. If listener is null, no exception is thrown and no action is taken.
trans-unit.target: 将PropertyChangeListener添加到侦听器列表。已为所有属性注册了侦听器。同一侦听器对象可以添加一次以上，并且将被添加多次。如果 listener 为null，则不会引发任何异常，并且不执行任何操作。

trans-unit.source: Add a VetoableChangeListener for a specific property. The listener will be invoked only when a call on fireVetoableChange names that specific property. The same listener object may be added more than once. For each property, the listener will be invoked the number of times it was added for that property. If propertyName or listener is null, no exception is thrown and no action is taken.
trans-unit.target: 为特定属性添加VetoableChangeListener。仅当对fireVetoableChange的调用命名该特定属性时，才会调用该侦听器。同一侦听器对象可能会添加多次。对于每个属性，将调用侦听器为该属性添加的次数。如果 propertyName 或 listener 为null，则不会引发任何异常并且不执行任何操作。

trans-unit.source: Add a VetoableChangeListener for a specific property. The same listener object may be added more than once. For each property, the listener will be invoked the number of times it was added for that property. If name or vcl is null, no exception is thrown and no action is taken.
trans-unit.target: 为特定属性添加VetoableChangeListener。同一侦听器对象可能会添加多次。对于每个属性，将调用侦听器为该属性添加的次数。如果 name 或 vcl 为null，则不会引发异常，也不会采取任何措施。

trans-unit.source: Add a VetoableChangeListener to the listener list. The listener is registered for all properties. The same listener object may be added more than once, and will be called as many times as it is added. If listener is null, no exception is thrown and no action is taken.
trans-unit.target: 将VetoableChangeListener添加到侦听器列表。已为所有属性注册了侦听器。同一侦听器对象可以添加一次以上，并且将被添加多次。如果 listener 为null，则不会引发任何异常，并且不执行任何操作。

trans-unit.source: Add a log Handler to receive logging messages.
trans-unit.target: 添加一个日志处理程序来接收日志信息。

trans-unit.source: Add a named logger. This does nothing and returns false if a logger with the same name is already registered.
trans-unit.target: 添加命名的记录仪。如果已经注册了具有相同名称的记录仪,则此操作不会产生任何作用,并返回 false。

trans-unit.source: Add a role info. This method of course should not be used after the creation of the relation type, because updating it would invalidate that the relations created associated to that type still conform to it. Can throw a RuntimeException if trying to update a relation type declared in the Relation Service.
trans-unit.target: 添加一个角色信息。当然这个方法不应该在创建关系类型之后使用,因为更新它将使创建的与该类型相关的关系仍然符合该类型。如果试图更新关系服务中声明的关系类型,可以抛出一个RuntimeException。

trans-unit.source: Add a service. If a service of the same type with the same algorithm name exists and it was added using putService(), it is replaced by the new service. This method also places information about this service in the provider's Hashtable values in the format described in the Java Cryptography Architecture API Specification & Reference .
trans-unit.target: 添加服务。如果存在具有相同算法名称的相同类型的服务，并使用 putService() 将其添加，则将其替换为新服务。此方法还将有关此服务的信息以Java密码体系结构API规范和参考中描述的格式放在提供者的Hashtable值中。

trans-unit.source: Add all the elements in values to this TabularData instance. If any element in values does not satisfy the constraints defined in put, or if any two elements in values have the same index calculated according to this TabularData instance's TabularType definition, then an exception describing the failure is thrown and no element of values is added, thus leaving this TabularData instance unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 将 values 所有元素添加到此 TabularData 实例。如果 values 中的任何元素不满足 put 中定义的约束，或者 values 中的任何两个元素具有根据此 TabularData 实例的 TabularType 定义计算的相同索引，则抛出描述失败的异常，并且不添加 values 元素，因此，此 TabularData 实例保持不变。

trans-unit.source: Add all the elements in values to this TabularData instance. If any element in values does not satisfy the constraints defined in put, or if any two elements in values have the same index calculated according to this TabularData instance's TabularType definition, then an exception describing the failure is thrown and no element of values is added, thus leaving this TabularData instance unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 将 values 所有元素添加到此 TabularData 实例。如果 values 中的任何元素不满足 put 中定义的约束，或者 values 中的任何两个元素具有根据此 TabularData 实例的 TabularType 定义计算的相同索引，则抛出描述失败的异常，并且不添加 values 元素，因此，此 TabularData 实例保持不变。

trans-unit.source: Add all the values contained in the specified map t to this TabularData instance. This method converts the collection of values contained in this map into an array of CompositeData values, if possible, and then call the method putAll(CompositeData[]). Note that the keys used in the specified map t are ignored. This method allows, for example to add the content of another TabularData instance with the same row type (but possibly different index names) into this instance.
trans-unit.target: 将指定映射 t 中包含的所有值添加到此 TabularData 实例。如果可能，此方法将此映射中包含的值的集合转换为 CompositeData 值的数组，然后调用方法 putAll(CompositeData[]) 。注意，指定映射 t 中使用的键将被忽略。例如，此方法允许将另一个具有相同行类型（但索引名称可能不同）的 TabularData 实例的内容添加到该实例中。

trans-unit.source: Add components from 'name' as the last components in remaining name.
trans-unit.target: 将'name'中的组件添加到剩余的name中作为最后一个组件。

trans-unit.source: Add name as the last component in remaining name.
trans-unit.target: 在剩下的名字中加入名字作为最后一个组成部分。

trans-unit.target: 将输入的月份添加到年月栏中。

trans-unit.source: Additional improvements of such classes might entail precomputing pending counts so that they can be established in constructors, specializing classes for leaf steps, subdividing by say, four, instead of two per iteration, and using an adaptive threshold instead of always subdividing down to single elements.
trans-unit.target: 这种类的其他改进可能包括:预先计算待定计数,以便在构造函数中建立这些计数;对叶步进行特殊化处理;每次迭代按四次而不是两次进行细分;使用自适应阈值而不是总是细分到单个元素。

trans-unit.source: Additional information can be obtained from the DayOfWeek. This includes textual names of the values.
trans-unit.target: 可以从 DayOfWeek 获得更多信息。这包括值的文本名称。

trans-unit.source: Additional input parameters required for executing the check may be specified through constructors of concrete implementations of this class.
trans-unit.target: 执行检查所需的其他输入参数可以通过该类的具体实现的构造函数来指定。

trans-unit.source: Additional metadata for a JMX element.
trans-unit.target: JMX元素的附加元数据。

trans-unit.source: Additional metadata for a JMX element. A Descriptor is associated with a MBeanInfo, MBeanAttributeInfo, etc. It consists of a collection of fields. A field is a name and an associated value.
trans-unit.target: JMX元素的其他元数据。一个 Descriptor 与相关 MBeanInfo ， MBeanAttributeInfo ，等它由字段集合的。字段是名称和关联的值。

trans-unit.source: Additional methods that depend on the presence or absence of a contained value are provided, such as orElse() (return a default value if value not present) and ifPresent() (execute a block of code if the value is present).
trans-unit.target: 提供了其他取决于所包含值是否存在的方法，例如 orElse() （如果不存在值，则返回默认值）和 ifPresent() （如果存在值，则执行代码块）。

trans-unit.target: 未来可能会引入更多的标准格式。

trans-unit.target: 第三方库可以使用这些技术提供其他流源。

trans-unit.source: Additional timer notifications can be added into regularly repeating notifications.
trans-unit.target: 额外的定时器通知可以添加到定期重复的通知中。

trans-unit.source: Additional value types
trans-unit.target: 附加值类型

trans-unit.source: Additional variants may be available through Chronology.getAvailableChronologies().
trans-unit.target: 其他变体可以通过 Chronology.getAvailableChronologies() 获得。

trans-unit.source: Additional words may be appended to the result of toString in the future if more properties are added to this class.
trans-unit.target: 如果将来有更多属性添加到此类，则将来可能会将其他单词附加到 toString 的结果。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, a writer can acquire the read lock, but not vice-versa. Among other applications, reentrancy can be useful when write locks are held during calls or callbacks to methods that perform reads under read locks. If a reader tries to acquire the write lock it will never succeed.
trans-unit.target: 此外,写者可以获得读锁,但反之亦然。在其他应用中,当在读锁下执行读的方法的调用或回调过程中持有写锁时,重入性是非常有用的。如果一个读者试图获取写锁,它将永远不会成功。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, an MLet can read a configuration file that specifies a set of MBeans to be registered in the same MBean Server as the MLet.
trans-unit.target: 另外， MLet 可以读取配置文件，该配置文件指定要在与 MLet 相同的MBean服务器中注册的一组MBean 。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, if this PermissionCollection contains the AllPermission, this method will always return true.
trans-unit.target: 此外,如果这个PermissionCollection包含AllPermission,这个方法将始终返回true。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, synthetic constructs in a class file, such as accessor methods used in implementing nested classes and bridge methods used in implementing covariant returns, are translation artifacts outside of this model.
trans-unit.target: 此外,类文件中的合成构造,如实现嵌套类时使用的访问器方法和实现共价返回时使用的桥接方法,都是本模型之外的翻译伪影。

trans-unit.source: Address types
trans-unit.target: 地址类型

trans-unit.source: Addresses
trans-unit.target: Addresses

trans-unit.source: Addresses -- This is the address assigned to the loopback interface. Anything sent to this IP address loops around and becomes IP input on the local host. This address is often used when testing a client.
trans-unit.target: 地址 --这是分配给环回接口的地址。发送到这个IP地址的任何东西都会循环起来,成为本地主机上的IP输入。这个地址经常在测试客户端时使用。

trans-unit.source: Addresses are covered in more detail below.
trans-unit.target: 下面将详细介绍地址。

trans-unit.source: Addresses are used throughout the java.net APIs as either host identifiers, or socket endpoint identifiers.
trans-unit.target: 地址在整个java.net API中被用作主机标识符,或socket端点标识符。

trans-unit.source: Adds (atomically) the given value to the pending count.
trans-unit.target: 将给定的值(原子地)添加到待定计数中。

trans-unit.source: Adds value to this TabularData instance. The composite type of value must be the same as this instance's row type (ie the composite type returned by this.getTabularType().getRowType()), and there must not already be an existing value in this TabularData instance whose index is the same as the one calculated for the value to be added. The index for value is calculated according to this TabularData instance's TabularType definition (see TabularType.getIndexNames()).
trans-unit.target: 将 value 添加到此 TabularData 实例。 value 的复合类型必须与此实例的行类型相同（即 this.getTabularType().getRowType() 。getRowType（）返回的复合类型），并且此 TabularData 实例中的索引相同的现有值已经不存在作为计算要添加 value 。 value 的索引是根据此 TabularData 实例的 TabularType 定义计算的（请参见 TabularType.getIndexNames() ）。

trans-unit.source: Adds a BeanContextServicesListener to this BeanContext
trans-unit.target: 添加一个 BeanContextServicesListener 来此BeanContext

trans-unit.source: Adds a CertStore to the end of the list of CertStores used in finding certificates and CRLs.
trans-unit.target: 将 CertStore 添加到用于查找证书和CRL 的 CertStore 列表的末尾。

trans-unit.source: Adds a PKIXCertPathChecker to the list of certification path checkers. See the setCertPathCheckers method for more details.
trans-unit.target: 将 PKIXCertPathChecker 添加到认证路径检查器列表。有关更多详细信息，请参见 setCertPathCheckers 方法。

trans-unit.source: Adds a PropertyChangeListener to this BeanContextChild in order to receive a PropertyChangeEvent whenever the specified property has changed.
trans-unit.target: 在此 BeanContextChild 中添加一个 PropertyChangeListener 以便在指定属性发生更改时接收 PropertyChangeEvent 。

trans-unit.source: Adds a VetoableChangeListener to this BeanContextChild to receive events whenever the specified property changes.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的属性更改时，将 VetoableChangeListener 添加到此 BeanContextChild 中以接收事件。

trans-unit.source: Adds a BeanContextMembershipListener
trans-unit.target: 添加一个BeanContextMembershipListener。

trans-unit.source: Adds a certificate for this identity. If the identity has a public key, the public key in the certificate must be the same, and if the identity does not have a public key, the identity's public key is set to be that specified in the certificate.
trans-unit.target: 为该身份添加一个证书,如果该身份有公钥,证书中的公钥必须相同。如果该身份有公钥,证书中的公钥必须是相同的,如果该身份没有公钥,则该身份的公钥设置为证书中指定的公钥。

trans-unit.source: Adds a copy of the given CharSequence value as the next element of the StringJoiner value. If newElement is null, then "null" is added.
trans-unit.target: 将给定 CharSequence 值的副本添加为 StringJoiner 值的下一个元素。如果 newElement 为 null ，则添加 "null" 。

trans-unit.source: Adds a general request property specified by a key-value pair. This method will not overwrite existing values associated with the same key.
trans-unit.target: 添加一个由键值对指定的通用请求属性。本方法不会覆盖与同一键相关联的现有值。

trans-unit.source: Adds a listener for receiving naming events fired when objects identified by the search filter filter and filter arguments at the object named by the string target name are modified. See the overload that accepts a Name for details of how this method behaves.
trans-unit.target: 添加一个侦听器，以接收由搜索过滤 filter 过滤器标识的对象和由字符串目标名称命名的对象的过滤器参数被修改时触发的命名事件。有关此方法的行为的详细信息，请参见接受 Name 的重载。

trans-unit.source: Adds a listener for receiving naming events fired when objects identified by the search filter filter and filter arguments at the object named by the target are modified. The scope, returningObj flag, and returningAttributes flag from the search controls ctls are used to control the selection of objects that the listener is interested in, and determines what information is returned in the eventual NamingEvent object. Note that the requested information to be returned might not be present in the NamingEvent object if they are unavailable or could not be obtained by the service provider or service.
trans-unit.target: 添加一个侦听器，以接收由搜索过滤 filter 过滤器标识的对象和目标指定的对象处的过滤器参数被修改时触发的命名事件。搜索控件 ctls 中的作用域，returningObj标志和returningAttributes标志用于控制侦听器感兴趣的对象的选择，并确定最终 NamingEvent 对象返回的信息。请注意，如果服务提供者或服务无法获得这些信息，则返回的请求信息可能不存在于 NamingEvent 对象中。

trans-unit.source: Adds a listener for receiving naming events fired when objects identified by the search filter filter at the object named by target are modified.
trans-unit.target: 添加一个侦听器，以接收在目标名称所命名的对象上由搜索过滤 filter 过滤器标识的对象被修改时触发的命名事件。

trans-unit.source: Adds a listener for receiving naming events fired when objects identified by the search filter filter at the object named by the string target name are modified. See the overload that accepts a Name for details of how this method behaves.
trans-unit.target: 添加一个侦听器，以接收在字符串目标名称所命名的对象上由搜索过滤 filter 过滤器标识的对象被修改时触发的命名事件。有关此方法的行为的详细信息，请参见接受 Name 的重载。

trans-unit.source: Adds a listener for receiving naming events fired when the object named by the string target name and scope changes. See the overload that accepts a Name for details.
trans-unit.target: 添加一个侦听器，以接收当字符串目标名称和作用域命名的对象发生更改时触发的命名事件。有关详细信息，请参见接受 Name 的重载。

trans-unit.source: Adds a listener for receiving naming events fired when the object(s) identified by a target and scope changes. The event source of those events is this context. See the class description for a discussion on event source and target. See the descriptions of the constants OBJECT_SCOPE, ONELEVEL_SCOPE, and SUBTREE_SCOPE to see how scope affects the registration.
trans-unit.target: 添加一个侦听器，以接收当目标和作用域标识的对象发生更改时触发的命名事件。这些事件的事件源就是此上下文。有关事件源和目标的讨论，请参见类描述。请参阅常量 OBJECT_SCOPE ， ONELEVEL_SCOPE 和 SUBTREE_SCOPE 的描述，以了解 scope 如何影响注册。

trans-unit.source: Adds a listener for the value change. When the property editor changes its value it should fire a PropertyChangeEvent on all registered PropertyChangeListeners, specifying the null value for the property name and itself as the source.
trans-unit.target: 为值更改添加一个侦听器。当属性编辑器改变其价值应该触发一个 PropertyChangeEvent 的所有注册 PropertyChangeListener S，指定 null 的属性名称和值本身作为源。

trans-unit.source: Adds a listener for the value change. When the property editor changes its value it should fire a PropertyChangeEvent on all registered PropertyChangeListeners, specifying the null value for the property name. If the source property is set, it should be used as the source of the event.
trans-unit.target: 为值更改添加一个侦听器。属性编辑器更改其值时，应在所有已注册的 PropertyChangeEvent 上触发 PropertyChangeListener ，并为属性名称指定 null 值。如果设置了source属性，则应将其用作事件的源。

trans-unit.source: Adds a listener to a registered MBean.
trans-unit.target: 为注册的MBean添加一个监听器。

trans-unit.source: Adds a listener to a registered MBean. Notifications emitted by the MBean will be forwarded to the listener.
trans-unit.target: 为注册的MBean添加一个监听器。MBean发出的通知将被转发给监听者。

trans-unit.source: Adds a listener to be informed of changes in connection status. The listener will receive notifications of type JMXConnectionNotification. An implementation can send other types of notifications too.
trans-unit.target: 添加一个侦听器以通知连接状态的变化。侦听器将收到 JMXConnectionNotification 类型的通知。实现也可以发送其他类型的通知。

trans-unit.source: Adds a listener to be informed of changes in connection status. The listener will receive notifications of type JMXConnectionNotification. An implementation can send other types of notifications too.
trans-unit.target: 添加一个侦听器以通知连接状态的变化。侦听器将收到 JMXConnectionNotification 类型的通知。实现也可以发送其他类型的通知。

trans-unit.source: Adds a listener to this MBean.
trans-unit.target: 为这个MBean添加一个听众。

trans-unit.source: Adds a listener to this line. Whenever the line's status changes, the listener's update() method is called with a LineEvent object that describes the change.
trans-unit.target: 将侦听器添加到此行。每当行的状态发生更改时， LineEvent 通过描述更改的LineEvent对象调用侦听器的 update() 方法。

trans-unit.source: Adds a listener.
trans-unit.target: 添加一个听众。

trans-unit.source: Adds a name to the issuerNames criterion. The issuer distinguished name in the X509CRL must match at least one of the specified distinguished names.
trans-unit.target: 将名称添加到issuerNames条件。 X509CRL 中的颁发者专有名称必须至少与指定的专有名称之一匹配。

trans-unit.source: Adds a name to the pathToNames criterion. The X509Certificate must not include name constraints that would prohibit building a path to the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 向pathToNames条件添加名称。在 X509Certificate 不得包含名称限制，禁止建设到指定名称的路径。

trans-unit.source: Adds a name to the subjectAlternativeNames criterion. The X509Certificate must contain all or at least one of the specified subjectAlternativeNames, depending on the value of the matchAllNames flag (see setMatchAllSubjectAltNames).
trans-unit.target: 将名称添加到subjectAlternativeNames条件。该 X509Certificate 必须包含所有或指定的subjectAlternativeNames中的至少一个，这取决于matchAllNames标志的值（见 setMatchAllSubjectAltNames ）。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new attribute node. If an attribute with that name ( nodeName) is already present in the element, it is replaced by the new one. Replacing an attribute node by itself has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 添加一个新的属性节点。如果元素中已经存在具有该名称的属性（ nodeName ），则将其替换为新属性。单独替换属性节点无效。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new attribute to a previously defined element that may be set to an arbitrary value.
trans-unit.target: 为先前定义的元素添加一个新的属性,该属性可以设置为一个任意值。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new attribute to a previously defined element that will be defined by a list of values.
trans-unit.target: 为先前定义的元素添加一个新的属性,该属性将由一个值列表来定义。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new attribute to a previously defined element that will be defined by a range of values.
trans-unit.target: 为先前定义的元素添加一个新的属性,该属性将由一个值的范围来定义。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new attribute to a previously defined element that will be defined by a set of enumerated values.
trans-unit.target: 为先前定义的元素添加一个新的属性,该属性将由一组枚举值定义。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new attribute to a previously defined element that will be defined by the enumerated values TRUE and FALSE, with a datatype of DATATYPE_BOOLEAN.
trans-unit.target: 向先前定义的元素添加新属性，该元素将由数据类型 DATATYPE_BOOLEAN 的枚举值 TRUE 和 FALSE 定义。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new attribute to the attribute set.
trans-unit.target: 向属性集添加一个新属性。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new attribute. If an attribute with that name is already present in the element, its value is changed to be that of the value parameter. This value is a simple string; it is not parsed as it is being set. So any markup (such as syntax to be recognized as an entity reference) is treated as literal text, and needs to be appropriately escaped by the implementation when it is written out. In order to assign an attribute value that contains entity references, the user must create an Attr node plus any Text and EntityReference nodes, build the appropriate subtree, and use setAttributeNode to assign it as the value of an attribute.
trans-unit.target: 添加一个新属性。如果元素中已经存在具有该名称的属性，则其值将更改为value参数的值。这个值是一个简单的字符串；设置时未对其进行解析。因此，任何标记（例如将被识别为实体引用的语法）都被视为原义文本，并且在实现时需要适当地对其进行转义。为了分配包含实体引用的属性值，用户必须创建一个 Attr 节点以及任何 Text 和 EntityReference 节点，构建适当的子树，并使用 setAttributeNode 将其分配为属性值。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new element type to this metadata document format with a child policy of CHILD_POLICY_REPEAT.
trans-unit.target: 使用 CHILD_POLICY_REPEAT 的子策略向此元数据文档格式添加新的元素类型。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new element type to this metadata document format with a child policy other than CHILD_POLICY_REPEAT.
trans-unit.target: 使用除 CHILD_POLICY_REPEAT 之外的子策略将新元素类型添加到此元数据文档格式。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new environment property to the environment of this context. If the property already exists, its value is overwritten. See class description for more details on environment properties.
trans-unit.target: 在此上下文的环境中添加一个新的环境属性。如果该属性已经存在,它的值将被覆盖。关于环境属性的更多细节,请参见类描述。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new event to the track. However, if the event is already contained in the track, it is not added again. The list of events is kept in time order, meaning that this event inserted at the appropriate place in the list, not necessarily at the end.
trans-unit.target: 将新事件添加到轨迹中。但是,如果该事件已经包含在轨道中,则不会再次添加。事件列表是按时间顺序排列的,这意味着该事件插入在列表的适当位置,而不一定是在最后。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new provider, at a specified position. The position is the preference order in which providers are searched for requested algorithms. The position is 1-based, that is, 1 is most preferred, followed by 2, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的位置添加一个新的提供者。位置是搜索所请求算法的提供者的优先顺序。位置是以1为基础的,也就是说,1是最优先的,其次是2,以此类推。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new unarrived party to this phaser. If an ongoing invocation of onAdvance(int, int) is in progress, this method may await its completion before returning. If this phaser has a parent, and this phaser previously had no registered parties, this child phaser is also registered with its parent. If this phaser is terminated, the attempt to register has no effect, and a negative value is returned.
trans-unit.target: 向此移相器添加一个新的未到达方。如果正在进行 onAdvance(int, int) 调用，则此方法可能在返回之前等待其完成。如果此相位器具有父级，并且此相位器以前没有注册方，则此子相位器也将与其父级一起注册。如果此相位器终止，则尝试注册无效，并且返回负值。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new value to the attribute. If the attribute values are unordered and attrVal is already in the attribute, this method does nothing. If the attribute values are ordered, attrVal is added to the end of the list of attribute values.
trans-unit.target: 将新值添加到属性。如果属性值是无序的并且 attrVal 已经在属性中，则此方法不执行任何操作。如果属性值是有序的，则 attrVal 将添加到属性值列表的末尾。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new value to this attribute.
trans-unit.target: 为该属性添加一个新值。

trans-unit.source: Adds a permission object to the PermissionCollection for the class the permission belongs to. For example, if
trans-unit.target: 为权限所属的类添加一个权限对象到PermissionCollection中。例如,如果

trans-unit.source: Adds a permission object to the current collection of permission objects.
trans-unit.target: 在当前的权限对象集合中添加一个权限对象。

trans-unit.source: Adds a provider to the next position available.
trans-unit.target: 将一个提供者添加到下一个可用职位。

trans-unit.source: Adds a service provider object to the registry. The provider is associated with the given category.
trans-unit.target: 向登记处添加服务提供者对象。服务提供者与给定类别相关联。

trans-unit.source: Adds a service provider object to the registry. The provider is associated within each category present in the registry whose Class it implements.
trans-unit.target: 将服务提供者对象添加到注册表。提供程序与它实现的 Class 的注册表中存在的每个类别相关联。

trans-unit.source: Adds a service to this BeanContext. BeanContextServiceProviders call this method to register a particular service with this context. If the service has not previously been added, the BeanContextServices associates the service with the BeanContextServiceProvider and fires a BeanContextServiceAvailableEvent to all currently registered BeanContextServicesListeners. The method then returns true, indicating that the addition of the service was successful. If the given service has already been added, this method simply returns false.
trans-unit.target: 向此BeanContext添加服务。 BeanContextServiceProvider 调用此方法以在此上下文中注册特定服务。如果服务以前没有添加时， BeanContextServices 中关联与服务 BeanContextServiceProvider 并触发一个 BeanContextServiceAvailableEvent 到所有当前已注册 BeanContextServicesListeners 。然后，该方法返回 true ，指示添加服务成功。如果已经添加了给定的服务，则此方法仅返回 false 。

trans-unit.source: Adds a set of attributes to a subrange of the string.
trans-unit.target: 为字符串的子范围添加一组属性。

trans-unit.source: Adds a set of service provider objects, taken from an Iterator to the registry. Each provider is associated within each category present in the registry whose Class it implements.
trans-unit.target: 将一组服务提供者对象（从 Iterator 中获取)添加到注册表中。每个提供程序都与它实现其 Class 的注册表中存在的每个类别相关联。

trans-unit.source: Adds a signed amount to the specified calendar field without changing larger fields. A negative roll amount means to subtract from field without changing larger fields. If the specified amount is 0, this method performs nothing.
trans-unit.target: 在不改变较大的字段的情况下,向指定的日历字段添加有符号的数量。负的卷积意味着从字段中减去,而不改变更大的字段。如果指定的金额为0,本方法不执行任何操作。

trans-unit.source: Adds a single RDN at a specified position within this LDAP name. RDNs of this LDAP name at or after the index (if any) of the new RDN are shifted up by one (away from index 0) to accommodate the new RDN.
trans-unit.target: 在这个LDAP名称的指定位置添加一个RDN。在新的 RDN 的索引(如果有的话)处或之后的 LDAP 名称的 RDN 将向上移动一个(远离索引 0),以容纳新的 RDN。

trans-unit.source: Adds a single RDN to the end of this LDAP name.
trans-unit.target: 在这个LDAP名称的末尾添加一个RDN。

trans-unit.source: Adds a single component at a specified position within this LDAP name. Components of this LDAP name at or after the index (if any) of the new component are shifted up by one (away from index 0) to accommodate the new component.
trans-unit.target: 在这个LDAP名称的指定位置添加一个组件。在新组件的索引(如果有的话)之后的LDAP名称的组件将向上移动一个(从索引0开始)以容纳新组件。

trans-unit.source: Adds a single component at a specified position within this composite name. Components of this composite name at or after the index of the new component are shifted up by one (away from index 0) to accommodate the new component.
trans-unit.target: 在这个合成名称的指定位置添加一个组件。该合成名称中位于新组件索引处或之后的组件将向上移动一个(远离索引0),以容纳新组件。

trans-unit.source: Adds a single component at a specified position within this compound name. Components of this compound name at or after the index of the new component are shifted up by one (away from index 0) to accommodate the new component.
trans-unit.target: 在这个复合名称的指定位置添加一个组件。在新组件的索引处或之后的复合名称的组件将向上移动一个(远离索引0),以容纳新组件。

trans-unit.source: Adds a single component at a specified position within this name. Components of this name at or after the index of the new component are shifted up by one (away from index 0) to accommodate the new component.
trans-unit.target: 在这个名称的指定位置添加一个组件。在新组件的索引处或之后的这个名称的组件将向上移动一个(远离索引0),以容纳新组件。

trans-unit.source: Adds a single component to the end of remaining name.
trans-unit.target: 在剩余名称的末尾添加一个组件。

trans-unit.source: Adds a single component to the end of this LDAP name.
trans-unit.target: 在这个LDAP名称的末尾添加一个组件。

trans-unit.source: Adds a single component to the end of this composite name.
trans-unit.target: 在这个复合名称的末尾添加一个单独的组件。

trans-unit.source: Adds a single component to the end of this compound name.
trans-unit.target: 在这个化合物名称的末尾添加一个单独的组件。

trans-unit.source: Adds a single component to the end of this name.
trans-unit.target: 在此名称的末尾添加一个单独的组件。

trans-unit.source: Adds a unicode locale attribute, if not already present, otherwise has no effect. The attribute must not be null and must be well-formed or an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 添加unicode语言环境属性（如果尚不存在），否则无效。该属性不能为null，并且格式必须正确，否则将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Adds all of the elements in the specified collection to this collection (optional operation). The behavior of this operation is undefined if the specified collection is modified while the operation is in progress. (This implies that the behavior of this call is undefined if the specified collection is this collection, and this collection is nonempty.)
trans-unit.target: 将指定集合中的所有元素添加到这个集合中(可选操作)。如果指定的集合在操作过程中被修改,那么这个操作的行为是未定义的。这意味着如果指定的集合是这个集合,并且这个集合是非空的,那么这个调用的行为是未定义的)。

trans-unit.source: Adds all of the elements in the specified collection to this queue. Attempts to addAll of a queue to itself result in IllegalArgumentException. Further, the behavior of this operation is undefined if the specified collection is modified while the operation is in progress.
trans-unit.target: 将指定集合中的所有元素添加到此队列。尝试将队列的全部添加到自身会导致 IllegalArgumentException 。此外，如果在操作进行过程中修改了指定的集合，则此操作的行为不确定。

trans-unit.source: Adds all of the elements in the specified collection to this set if they're not already present (optional operation). If the specified collection is also a set, the addAll operation effectively modifies this set so that its value is the
trans-unit.target: 如果指定集合中的所有元素尚不存在，则将它们添加到此集合中（可选操作）。如果指定的集合也是一个集合，则 addAll 操作会有效地修改此集合，使其值为

trans-unit.source: Adds all of the elements in the specified collection to this set if they're not already present. If the specified collection is also a set, the addAll operation effectively modifies this set so that its value is the
trans-unit.target: 如果指定集合中的所有元素尚不存在，则将其添加到该集合中。如果指定的集合也是一个集合，则 addAll 操作会有效地修改此集合，使其值为

trans-unit.source: Adds all of the elements in the specified collection to this set, as if by calling add(K) on each one.
trans-unit.target: 将指定集合中的所有元素添加到此集合中，就像通过在每个集合上调用 add(K) 一样。

trans-unit.source: Adds all of the elements in the specified collection to this set.
trans-unit.target: 将指定集合中的所有元素添加到这个集合中。

trans-unit.source: Adds all of the elements in the specified set to this attribute. The outcome is the same as if the add(Attribute) operation had been applied to this attribute set successively with each element from the specified set. If none of the categories in the specified set are the same as any categories in this attribute set, the addAll() operation effectively modifies this attribute set so that its value is the
trans-unit.target: 将指定集中的所有元素添加到此属性。结果与将 add(Attribute) 操作与指定集中的每个元素相继应用于此属性集的结果相同。如果指定集中的任何类别都不与此属性集中的任何类别相同，则 addAll() 操作将有效地修改此属性集，使其值为

trans-unit.source: Adds all of the elements in the specified set to this attribute. The outcome is the same as if the add(Attribute) operation had been applied to this attribute set successively with each element from the specified set. The behavior of the addAll(AttributeSet) operation is unspecified if the specified set is modified while the operation is in progress.
trans-unit.target: 将指定集中的所有元素添加到此属性。结果与将 add(Attribute) 操作与指定集中的每个元素相继应用于此属性集的结果相同。如果在操作进行过程中修改了指定的集合，则未指定 addAll(AttributeSet) 操作的行为。

trans-unit.source: Adds all of the elements in the specified set to this attribute. The outcome is the same as if the add(Attribute) operation had been applied to this attribute set successively with each element from the specified set. If none of the categories in the specified set are the same as any categories in this attribute set, the addAll() operation effectively modifies this attribute set so that its value is the
trans-unit.target: 将指定集中的所有元素添加到此属性。结果与将 add(Attribute) 操作与指定集中的每个元素相继应用于此属性集的结果相同。如果指定集中的任何类别都不与此属性集中的任何类别相同，则 addAll() 操作将有效地修改此属性集，使其值为

trans-unit.source: Adds all of the elements in the specified set to this attribute. The outcome is the same as if the add(Attribute) operation had been applied to this attribute set successively with each element from the specified set. If none of the categories in the specified set are the same as any categories in this attribute set, the addAll() operation effectively modifies this attribute set so that its value is the
trans-unit.target: 将指定集中的所有元素添加到此属性。结果与将 add(Attribute) 操作与指定集中的每个元素相继应用于此属性集的结果相同。如果指定集中的任何类别都不与此属性集中的任何类别相同，则 addAll() 操作将有效地修改此属性集，使其值为

trans-unit.source: Adds all of the elements in the specified set to this attribute. The outcome is the same as if the add(Attribute) operation had been applied to this attribute set successively with each element from the specified set. If none of the categories in the specified set are the same as any categories in this attribute set, the addAll() operation effectively modifies this attribute set so that its value is the
trans-unit.target: 将指定集中的所有元素添加到此属性。结果与将 add(Attribute) 操作与指定集中的每个元素相继应用于此属性集的结果相同。如果指定集中的任何类别都不与此属性集中的任何类别相同，则 addAll() 操作将有效地修改此属性集，使其值为

trans-unit.source: Adds all of the elements in the specified set to this attribute. The outcome is the same as if the = add(Attribute) operation had been applied to this attribute set successively with each element from the specified set. The behavior of the addAll(AttributeSet) operation is unspecified if the specified set is modified while the operation is in progress.
trans-unit.target: 将指定集中的所有元素添加到此属性。结果与将= add(Attribute) 操作与指定集中的每个元素相继应用于此属性集的结果相同。如果在操作进行过程中修改了指定的集合，则未指定 addAll(AttributeSet) 操作的行为。

trans-unit.source: Adds all of the specified elements to the specified collection. Elements to be added may be specified individually or as an array. The behavior of this convenience method is identical to that of c.addAll(Arrays.asList(elements)), but this method is likely to run significantly faster under most implementations.
trans-unit.target: 将所有指定的元素添加到指定的集合中。要添加的元素可以单独指定，也可以指定为数组。此便捷方法的行为与 c.addAll(Arrays.asList(elements)) 的行为相同，但是在大多数实现下，此方法的运行速度可能明显更快。

trans-unit.source: Adds all the mappings in a given Map to this Bindings.
trans-unit.target: 将给定 Map 中的所有映射添加到此 Bindings 中。

trans-unit.source: Adds an IIOReadProgressListener to the list of registered progress listeners. If listener is null, no exception will be thrown and no action will be taken.
trans-unit.target: 将 IIOReadProgressListener 添加到已注册的进度侦听器列表中。如果 listener 为 null ，则不会引发异常，也不会采取任何措施。

trans-unit.source: Adds an IIOReadUpdateListener to the list of registered update listeners. If listener is null, no exception will be thrown and no action will be taken. The listener will receive notification of pixel updates as images and thumbnails are decoded, including the starts and ends of progressive passes.
trans-unit.target: 将 IIOReadUpdateListener 添加到已注册的更新侦听器列表中。如果 listener 为 null ，则不会引发异常，也不会采取任何措施。侦听器将在解码图像和缩略图时收到像素更新的通知，包括渐进遍历的开始和结束。

trans-unit.source: Adds an IIOReadWarningListener to the list of registered warning listeners. If listener is null, no exception will be thrown and no action will be taken. Messages sent to the given listener will be localized, if possible, to match the current Locale. If no Locale has been set, warning messages may be localized as the reader sees fit.
trans-unit.target: 将 IIOReadWarningListener 添加到已注册的警告侦听器列表中。如果 listener 为 null ，则不会引发异常，也不会采取任何措施。发送到给定侦听器的消息将进行本地化，以匹配当前的 Locale 。如果未 Locale 设置，则警告消息可能会在读者认为合适的情况下进行本地化。

trans-unit.source: Adds an IIOWriteProgressListener to the list of registered progress listeners. If listener is null, no exception will be thrown and no action will be taken.
trans-unit.target: 将 IIOWriteProgressListener 添加到已注册的进度侦听器列表中。如果 listener 为 null ，则不会引发异常，也不会采取任何措施。

trans-unit.source: Adds an IIOWriteWarningListener to the list of registered warning listeners. If listener is null, no exception will be thrown and no action will be taken. Messages sent to the given listener will be localized, if possible, to match the current Locale. If no Locale has been set, warning messages may be localized as the writer sees fit.
trans-unit.target: 将 IIOWriteWarningListener 添加到已注册的警告侦听器列表中。如果 listener 为 null ，则不会引发异常，也不会采取任何措施。发送到给定侦听器的消息将进行本地化，以匹配当前的 Locale 。如果未 Locale 设置，则警告消息可能会按照作者认为合适的方式进行本地化。

trans-unit.source: Adds an ACL entry to this ACL. An entry associates a principal (e.g., an individual or a group) with a set of permissions. Each principal can have at most one positive ACL entry (specifying permissions to be granted to the principal) and one negative ACL entry (specifying permissions to be denied). If there is already an ACL entry of the same type (negative or positive) already in the ACL, false is returned.
trans-unit.target: 向该ACL添加一个ACL条目。一个条目将一个委托人(例如,一个个人或一个组)与一组权限联系起来。每个委托人最多可以有一个正的ACL条目(指定要授予委托人的权限)和一个负的ACL条目(指定要拒绝的权限)。如果ACL中已经有一个相同类型的ACL条目(消极或积极),则返回false。

trans-unit.source: Adds an MBean created by the user (and registered by him in the MBean Server) as a relation in the Relation Service.
trans-unit.target: 添加一个由用户创建的MBean(并由他在MBean服务器中注册)作为关系服务中的关系。

trans-unit.source: Adds an address to the end of the list of addresses.
trans-unit.target: 在地址列表的末尾添加一个地址。

trans-unit.source: Adds an address to the list of addresses at index posn. All addresses at index posn or greater are shifted up the list by one (away from index 0).
trans-unit.target: 将一个地址添加到索引 posn 的地址列表中。索引 posn 或更大的所有地址在列表中向上移动一个(远离索引 0)。

trans-unit.source: Adds an attribute to a subrange of the string.
trans-unit.target: 为字符串的子范围添加一个属性。

trans-unit.source: Adds an attribute to the entire string.
trans-unit.target: 为整个字符串添加一个属性。

trans-unit.source: Adds an attribute value to the ordered list of attribute values. This method adds attrVal to the list of attribute values at index ix. Values located at indices at or greater than ix are shifted down towards the end of the list (and their indices incremented by one). If the attribute values are unordered and already have attrVal, IllegalStateException is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 将属性值添加到属性值的有序列表中。此方法将 attrVal 添加到索引 ix 处的属性值列表中。位于 ix 或大于ix的索引处的值向下移到列表的末尾（它们的索引加一）。如果属性值是无序的并且已经具有 attrVal ，则抛出 IllegalStateException 。

trans-unit.source: Adds an element to the stream being built.
trans-unit.target: 为正在构建的流添加一个元素。

trans-unit.source: Adds an event listener to be invoked when the logging properties are re-read. Adding multiple instances of the same event Listener results in multiple entries in the property event listener table.
trans-unit.target: 添加一个事件监听器,以便在重新读取日志属性时调用。添加同一事件监听器的多个实例会导致属性事件监听器表中出现多个条目。

trans-unit.source: Adds an existing element to the list of legal children for a given parent node type.
trans-unit.target: 在给定的父节点类型的合法子节点列表中添加一个现有元素。

trans-unit.source: Adds an identity to this identity scope.
trans-unit.target: 为该身份范围添加一个身份。

trans-unit.source: Adds an observer to the set of observers for this object, provided that it is not the same as some observer already in the set. The order in which notifications will be delivered to multiple observers is not specified. See the class comment.
trans-unit.target: 在该对象的观察者集合中添加一个观察者,条件是该观察者与集合中已有的某个观察者不同。没有指定向多个观察者发送通知的顺序。参见类注释。

trans-unit.source: Adds an owner. Only owners can modify ACL contents. The caller principal must be an owner of the ACL in order to invoke this method. That is, only an owner can add another owner. The initial owner is configured at ACL construction time.
trans-unit.target: 添加一个所有者。只有所有者才能修改ACL内容。调用者委托人必须是ACL的所有者才能调用本方法。也就是说,只有所有者才能添加另一个所有者。初始所有者是在ACL构建时配置的。

trans-unit.source: Adds the contents of the given StringJoiner without prefix and suffix as the next element if it is non-empty. If the given StringJoiner is empty, the call has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 如果给定的 StringJoiner 内容为非空，则将其添加为下一个元素，不带前缀和后缀。如果给定的 StringJoiner 为空，则该调用无效。

trans-unit.source: Adds the given number of new unarrived parties to this phaser. If an ongoing invocation of onAdvance(int, int) is in progress, this method may await its completion before returning. If this phaser has a parent, and the given number of parties is greater than zero, and this phaser previously had no registered parties, this child phaser is also registered with its parent. If this phaser is terminated, the attempt to register has no effect, and a negative value is returned.
trans-unit.target: 将给定数量的新未到达方添加到此移相器。如果正在进行 onAdvance(int, int) 调用，则此方法可能在返回之前等待其完成。如果此相位器具有父级，并且给定的参与方数大于零，并且此相位器以前没有注册方，则此子相位器也将在其父级中注册。如果此相位器终止，则尝试注册无效，并且返回负值。

trans-unit.source: Adds the given printer state reason to this printer state reasons attribute, associating it with the given severity level. If this printer state reasons attribute previously contained a mapping for the given printer state reason, the old value is replaced.
trans-unit.target: 将给定的打印机状态原因添加到该打印机状态原因属性中,并将其与给定的严重程度相关联。如果该打印机状态原因属性之前包含给定打印机状态原因的映射,则替换旧值。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified (signed) amount of time to the given calendar field, based on the calendar's rules.
trans-unit.target: 根据日历的规则,在给定的日历字段中添加指定的(签名的)时间量。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified (signed) amount to the specified calendar field without changing larger fields. A negative amount means to roll down.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的(有符号的)金额添加到指定的日历字段中,而不改变更大的字段。负数表示向下滚动。

trans-unit.target: 添加指定 BeanContextMembershipListener 接收 BeanContextMembershipEvents 从此 BeanContext 中无论何时添加或删除子 Component （S）。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified attribute to this attribute set if it is not already present, first removing any existing in the same attribute category as the specified attribute value.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified attribute to this attribute set if it is not already present, first removing any existing value in the same attribute category as the specified attribute value.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified attribute value to this attribute set if it is not already present, first removing any existing value in the same attribute category as the specified attribute value (optional operation).
trans-unit.target: 将指定的属性值添加到这个属性集中,如果它还不存在,首先要删除与指定属性值相同的属性类别中的任何现有值(可选操作)。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified element as the tail (last element) of this list.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified element to this job state reasons attribute if it is not already present. The element to be added must be an instance of class JobStateReason. If this job state reasons attribute already contains the specified element, the call leaves this job state reasons attribute unchanged and returns false.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的元素尚不存在，则将其添加到此工作状态原因属性中。要添加的元素必须是 JobStateReason 类的实例。如果此作业状态原因属性已经包含指定的元素，则调用将使该作业状态原因属性保持不变，并返回 false 。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified element to this queue, waiting if necessary for another thread to receive it.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的元素添加到这个队列中,必要时等待另一个线程来接收它。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified element to this set if it is not already present (optional operation). More formally, adds the specified element e to this set if the set contains no element e2 such that (e==null ? e2==null : e.equals(e2)). If this set already contains the element, the call leaves the set unchanged and returns false. In combination with the restriction on constructors, this ensures that sets never contain duplicate elements.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的元素尚不存在，则将其添加到该集合中（可选操作）。更正式地讲，如果集合中不包含任何元素 e2 ，则将指定的元素 e 添加到该集合中，使得 (e==null ? e2==null : e.equals(e2)) 。如果此集合已经包含该元素，则调用将使该集合保持不变，并返回 false 。结合对构造函数的限制，这可以确保集合永远不会包含重复的元素。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified element to this set if it is not already present. If this set already contains the element, the call leaves the set unchanged and returns false.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified element to this set if it is not already present. More formally, adds the specified element e to this set if the set contains no element e2 such that e.equals(e2). If this set already contains the element, the call leaves the set unchanged and returns false.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified element to this set if it is not already present. If this set already contains the element, the call leaves the set unchanged and returns false.

trans-unit.source: Adjacent value parsing applies to each set of fixed width not-negative values in the parser that immediately follow any kind of value, variable or fixed width. Calling any other append method will end the setup of adjacent value parsing. Thus, in the unlikely event that you need to avoid adjacent value parsing behavior, simply add the appendValue to another DateTimeFormatterBuilder and add that to this builder.
trans-unit.target: 相邻值解析适用于解析器中紧随任何类型的值，可变或固定宽度之后的每组固定宽度非负值。调用任何其他append方法将结束相邻值解析的设置。因此，在极有可能需要避免相邻值解析行为的情况下，只需将 appendValue 添加到另一个 DateTimeFormatterBuilder 并将其添加到此构建器。

trans-unit.source: Adjust the day-of-month to the last valid day if necessary
trans-unit.target: 如有必要,将月份调整为最后的有效日期。

trans-unit.source: Adjusters are a key tool for modifying temporal objects. They exist to externalize the process of adjustment, permitting different approaches, as per the strategy design pattern. Examples might be an adjuster that sets the date avoiding weekends, or one that sets the date to the last day of the month.
trans-unit.target: 调整器是修改时间对象的一个关键工具。它们的存在是为了将调整过程外部化,允许按照策略设计模式采用不同的方法。例如,调整器可以避开周末设置日期,或者将日期设置为一个月的最后一天。

trans-unit.target: 调整和查询

trans-unit.source: After a channel is closed, any further attempt to invoke I/O operations upon it will cause a ClosedChannelException to be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 关闭通道后，任何进一步尝试在其上调用I / O操作的操作都将引发 ClosedChannelException 。

trans-unit.source: After a file system is closed then all subsequent access to the file system, either by methods defined by this class or on objects associated with this file system, throw ClosedFileSystemException. If the file system is already closed then invoking this method has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 关闭文件系统后，随后通过此类定义的方法或与此文件系统关联的对象上的所有对该文件系统的后续访问都将引发 ClosedFileSystemException 。如果文件系统已经关闭，则调用此方法无效。

trans-unit.source: After a selector is closed, any further attempt to use it, except by invoking this method or the wakeup method, will cause a ClosedSelectorException to be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 关闭选择器后，除非通过调用此方法或 wakeup 方法，否则任何进一步使用它的尝试都会导致引发 ClosedSelectorException 。

trans-unit.source: After a watch service is closed, any further attempt to invoke operations upon it will throw ClosedWatchServiceException. If this watch service is already closed then invoking this method has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 关闭监视服务后，对其进行任何其他调用操作的尝试都将引发 ClosedWatchServiceException 。如果此监视服务已关闭，则调用此方法无效。

trans-unit.source: After an explicit open (either before or after implicit opens), the device will not be closed by implicit closing. The only way to close an explicitly opened device is an explicit close.
trans-unit.target: 在显式打开之后(无论是在隐式打开之前还是之后),设备将不会被隐式关闭。关闭显式打开的设备的唯一方法是显式关闭。

trans-unit.source: After every group has been converted to a character by this process, the characters are gathered, in the same order in which their corresponding groups were read from the input stream, to form a String, which is returned.
trans-unit.target: 通过此过程将每个组转换为字符后，将按照从输入流中读取其相应组的顺序收集字符，以形成 String ，然后将其返回。

trans-unit.source: After execution of the terminal stream operation there are no guarantees that the reader will be at a specific position from which to read the next character or line.
trans-unit.target: 在执行终端流操作后,并不能保证读取器会在特定的位置上读取下一个字符或行。

trans-unit.source: After invoking this method, subsequent invocations of the iterator method will lazily look up and instantiate providers from scratch, just as is done by a newly-created loader.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法之后， iterator 方法的后续调用将懒惰地查找并实例化提供程序，就像新创建的加载程序一样。

trans-unit.source: After membership is dropped it may still be possible to receive datagrams sent to the group. This can arise when datagrams are waiting to be received in the socket's receive buffer. After membership is dropped then the channel may join the group again in which case a new membership key is returned.
trans-unit.target: 删除成员资格后，仍然有可能接收发送到该组的数据报。当数据报正在等待在套接字的接收缓冲区中接收时，可能会出现这种情况。删除成员资格后，频道可以再次 join 该组，在这种情况下，将返回新的成员资格密钥。

trans-unit.source: After passing the initial "level" check, the Logger will call this Filter to check if a log record should really be published.
trans-unit.target: 在通过最初的 "级别 "检查后,记录仪将调用该过滤器来检查是否真的应该发布日志记录。

trans-unit.source: After passing this initial (cheap) test, the Logger will allocate a LogRecord to describe the logging message. It will then call a Filter (if present) to do a more detailed check on whether the record should be published. If that passes it will then publish the LogRecord to its output Handlers. By default, loggers also publish to their parent's Handlers, recursively up the tree.
trans-unit.target: 在通过这个初始(廉价)测试后,记录器将分配一个日志记录来描述记录消息。然后,它将调用一个过滤器(如果存在的话)来对记录是否应该被发布进行更详细的检查。如果通过,它将把日志记录发布到其输出处理程序。默认情况下,日志记录器也会向其父级处理程序发布,并在树上递归。

trans-unit.source: After removing client from the list of connections, this method calls closeClient(client).
trans-unit.target: 从连接列表中删除 client 后，此方法将调用 closeClient(client) 。

trans-unit.target: 在四舍五入后,对产生的幅度进行格式化处理。

trans-unit.source: After the AccessController.getContext method receives the combined stack of ProtectionDomains back from the DomainCombiner, it returns a new AccessControlContext that has both the combined ProtectionDomains as well as the DomainCombiner.
trans-unit.target: 在 AccessController.getContext 方法从 DomainCombiner 返回组合的ProtectionDomains堆栈后，它返回一个新的AccessControlContext，该控件同时具有组合的ProtectionDomains和 DomainCombiner 。

trans-unit.source: After the finalize method has been invoked for an object, no further action is taken until the Java virtual machine has again determined that there is no longer any means by which this object can be accessed by any thread that has not yet died, including possible actions by other objects or classes which are ready to be finalized, at which point the object may be discarded.
trans-unit.target: 在为对象调用 finalize 方法之后，直到Java虚拟机再次确定不再有任何方法可以由尚未死亡的任何线程访问该对象之后，才采取进一步的措施，包括可能的措施可以通过其他准备完成的对象或类来完成，此时可以丢弃该对象。

trans-unit.source: After the entries have been written, the output stream is flushed. The output stream remains open after this method returns.
trans-unit.target: 写完条目后,输出流被刷新。在本方法返回后,输出流仍然开放。

trans-unit.source: After the last live reference to a Timer object goes away
trans-unit.target: 在最后一个对 Timer 对象的实时引用消失之后

trans-unit.source: After the protocol version there must be a space, followed by the implementation name. The format of the implementation name is unspecified. It is recommended that it include an implementation version number. An implementation can use an empty string as its implementation name, for example for security reasons.
trans-unit.target: 在协议版本之后必须有一个空格,然后是实施名称。实施名称的格式未作规定。建议它包括一个实现版本号。例如,出于安全考虑,实施例可以使用空字符串作为其实施例名称。

trans-unit.source: After the service provider has sent the extended operation request to the LDAP server, it will receive a response from the server. If the operation failed, the provider will throw a NamingException. If the operation succeeded, the provider will invoke this method using the data that it got back in the response. It is the job of this method to return a class that implements the ExtendedResponse interface that is appropriate for the extended operation request.
trans-unit.target: 服务提供者向LDAP服务器发送扩展操作请求后,将收到服务器的响应。如果操作失败,提供者将抛出一个NamingException。如果操作成功,提供者将使用它在响应中得到的数据来调用这个方法。这个方法的工作就是返回一个实现ExtendedResponse接口的类,这个类适合扩展操作请求。

trans-unit.source: After this method returns, subsequent calls to Future.isDone() will always return true. Subsequent calls to Future.isCancelled() will always return true if this method returned true.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回后，对 Future.isDone() 的后续调用将始终返回 true 。随后调用 Future.isCancelled() 总是返回 true ，如果这个方法返回 true 。

trans-unit.source: After this method returns, subsequent calls to isDone() will always return true. Subsequent calls to isCancelled() will always return true if this method returned true.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回后，对 isDone() 的后续调用将始终返回 true 。随后调用 isCancelled() 总是返回 true ，如果这个方法返回 true 。

trans-unit.source: After this method returns, then any subsequent I/O exception that occurs while reading from the file or when a malformed or unmappable byte sequence is read, is wrapped in an UncheckedIOException that will be thrown from the Stream method that caused the read to take place. In case an IOException is thrown when closing the file, it is also wrapped as an UncheckedIOException.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回后，然后在从文件读取或读取格式错误或不可映射的字节序列时发生的任何后续I / O异常都包装在 UncheckedIOException 中，该异常将从 Stream 方法中引发，导致读取发生。在情况下， IOException 的抛出关闭文件时，它也被缠绕作为 UncheckedIOException 。

trans-unit.source: After type matching, a call to invokeExact directly and immediately invoke the method handle's underlying method (or other behavior, as the case may be).
trans-unit.target: 类型匹配后，直接调用 invokeExact 并立即调用方法句柄的基础方法（或其他行为，视情况而定）。

trans-unit.source: Afterwards, the tool calls getSupportedAnnotationTypes, getSupportedOptions, and getSupportedSourceVersion. These methods are only called once per run, not on each round.
trans-unit.target: 之后，该工具将调用 getSupportedAnnotationTypes ， getSupportedOptions 和 getSupportedSourceVersion 。这些方法每次运行仅调用一次，而不是在每个回合中调用一次。
